titleStmt.title: The conversion of a sinner faithfully translated out of Italian, by M.K.
Breefe treatise exhorting sinners to repentance
titleStmt.author: Luis, de Granada, 1504-1588.
M. K., fl. 1580.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Thomas Creede, for I. P[arnell].,

notesStmt.note: An edition of Luis de Granada "A breefe treatise exhorting sinners to repentance".
Attributed to Luis de Granada on A2r.
Reproduction of original in the All Souls College Library, Oxford, England.
